item.description:
See the earlier gun show events in Concord NH - we will have our pattern established and our discussion points ready for all gun show visitors who may be inclined to overlook the best candidate in the race out of lack of knowledge, although I can't see our northern friends allowing this to happen...


Help support Ron Paul by spreading his name to those upholding their 2nd amendment rights. Come hold signs and hand out literature outside the event.

October 13 - 14, 2007
Saturday 9 to 5
Sunday 9 to 2
item.name: Manchester Gun Show Day 1
